code_value: ets_th1 It’s time to wake up, or you will be late for school.</br>ets_th2 Could you go to the English Corner with me tonight?</br>ets_th3 I am sorry that I have kept you waiting for so long.</br>ets_th4 You look pretty in this dress.
ets_th1 It’s time to wake up, or you will be late for school.
ets_th2 Could you go to the English Corner with me tonight?
ets_th3 I am sorry that I have kept you waiting for so long.
ets_th4 You look pretty in this dress.
